For Parents & Students

Stay Connected to Your Child's Education

Be an active participant in your child's learning journey with real-time insights, direct communication with teachers, and AI-powered learning support.

Download AppView Demo

Everything You Need to Support Your Child

From real-time progress tracking to AI-powered homework help, FlexDesk gives you the tools to be actively involved in your child's educational success.

Real-Time Progress Tracking
Monitor your child's academic progress, grades, and achievements in real-time.
  • Live grade updates
  • Progress reports
  • Achievement tracking
  • Performance analytics
Direct Teacher Communication
Seamless communication with teachers and school staff through integrated messaging.
  • Direct messaging
  • Video calls
  • Group discussions
  • Translation support
Schedule & Events
Stay informed about school events, assignments, and important dates.
  • Event calendar
  • Assignment due dates
  • School announcements
  • Reminder notifications
AI Homework Helper
AI-powered tutoring assistant to help your child with homework and learning.
  • 24/7 tutoring support
  • Step-by-step explanations
  • Practice problems
  • Learning resources
Smart Notifications
Receive personalized alerts about your child's school activities and performance.
  • Attendance alerts
  • Grade notifications
  • Behavior updates
  • Emergency alerts
Mobile App Access
Access all features on-the-go with our intuitive mobile application.
  • iOS & Android apps
  • Offline access
  • Push notifications
  • Secure login
For Students

Personalized Learning Experience

Students get access to AI-powered tutoring, personalized learning paths, and interactive tools that make learning engaging and effective.

  • AI tutoring available 24/7
  • Personalized learning paths
  • Interactive homework assistance
  • Achievement badges and rewards
  • Progress tracking and goals
